items.text: dropped! Easiest of chances for the bowler, and the team's best fielder has missed a sitter. Full on middle, and Mushfiqur's straight drive went into Dhananjaya's body. He cups his hands to take the catch, but the ball hits his wrist and falls to his left
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle, and fended off the front foot
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and clipped away to deep midwicket. Mushi keeps the strike
items.postText: Adarsh : "The best part of conducting Asia Cup in UAE is that it truly feels Asian. All the 5 big teams (Ind, Pak, Ban, SL and Afg) do have considerable fan base in this very part of the country. They live in harmony. Such a nice place to live. However the tournament should have played in December-January when the weather is pleasant. "
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: Mushfiqur gives the charge, and Thisara drops it short. He just couldn't connect with the attempted cut
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and he nudges it behind square for a single
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: goes short, and like before, Mashrafe ducks under this delivery. Didn't bounce a lot though, but still a safe measure with the pitch displaying a true bounce
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, but Mashrafe stays on the back foot, and then swats this half-tracker to the wide long-on boundary! Picked the length so early, that he smacked the pull in front of square
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball, but short on off stump Mashrafe ducks once again
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and he works this fine down the leg side for a single. Played off his hips on this occasion
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and nudged away off his pads to the fielder at square leg
items.shortText: de Silva to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump once again, and he digs a shot away to the leg-side fielder in the deep. Long strides taken by the batsmen as they huff and puff their way back for a second run
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle, and that's been worked off his toes to the deep midwicket fielder once again
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full and fast, but going down leg. No shot offered
items.shortText: de Silva to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 wide

items.text: almost a yorker on middle stump, and Mashrafe does well to squeeze this back to the bowler. Could've easily slipped under his bat there
items.shortText: de Silva to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full on middle, and comfortably blocked off the front foot
items.shortText: de Silva to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: sliced to cover point! Slightly faster one from Dhananjaya, and he bowls this wider than usual. Mashrafe looks to free his arms, but the bat turns in his hand, and the shot pops straight into the safe hands of Upul Tharanga
items.postText: suohsuibdk: "The over rate is atrocious; continue on like this and this match will be over in a total of eight hours!" -- yep, it's slightly slower because of the many beverage breaks needed due to the heat. Hopefully things will quicken up in the evening session.
items.shortText: de Silva to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Tharanga b de Silva 11 (18b 2x4 0x6) SR: 61.11

items.text: full on middle, but that's been carefully tapped to the fielder at midwicket. Steals a quick single before the fielder could pick the ball up
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: classic Malinga! Yorker just outside off stump, and somehow beats the outside of off stump. Sneaks through the gap between bat and pads
items.postText: amit: "I can't imagine a more intense rivalry between two evenly matched teams like SL vs BD for the past two years. Being neutral, this is very pleasant to watch and enjoy. "
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he defends off the front foot, but the ball comes off the bat's inside half. Trickles away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, but shoveled away to midwicket off the front foot. There was a single on offer, but looked like Mushi said no
items.postText: Suseendran : "If SL gets the last 2 wkts in the next 5 overs, then the over-rate would be a non issue. "
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he plays a check-drive through to cover
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: offcutter just outside off stump, and Mushfiqur does the best thing possible as a Bangladesh batsman. Steers this down to third man and ensures he keeps the strike. Protecting Rubel as much as possible.
items.postText: srini: "Very familiar tale - this Bangla innings. Despite playing international cricket for so long, having the privilege of esteemed coaches, they still didn't learn to apply themselves and play according to the match situation. Given the start they had and the frail lower order they have, one of the senior batsmen needed to be there at the other end to support Mushfiqur. If you are short on talent, understandable. But this team is talented . Being short of intent is the problem."
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Final powerplay starts. Can keep five fielders outside the circle.
items.text: full toss on middle, and he tries to paddle this fine. But can't play it as fine as he wants. Goes to short fine leg on the bounce
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and nudged with soft hands to deep midwicket. Calls early for the second, and ensures he gets back on strike once again
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: full on off, and he shovels a shot to Mathews at cover. Too full for the batsman to get underneath it
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
